title: Tech Innovators

teacher.name: Ashley Johnson
teacher.bio: Lead instructor with 8+ years experience in web development and youth education. Passionate about empowering young people through technology.

description: Advanced programming for teenagers. Focus on real-world projects, portfolio building, and career preparation.

title: Code Explorers

teacher.name: Michael Chen
teacher.bio: Computer Science graduate with a passion for teaching web development to young learners. Specializes in making complex concepts accessible.

description: Bridge programming course introducing web development and Python basics for intermediate students.

title: Code Explorers

teacher.name: Sarah Williams
teacher.bio: Experienced educator with background in creative technology. Loves helping students discover the artistic side of programming.

description: Continuation of Code Explorers program with focus on creative projects and collaborative learning.

title: Junior Ninjas

teacher.name: Emma Thompson
teacher.bio: Primary school teacher turned coding instructor. Expert at making programming fun and accessible for young children.

description: Introduction to programming for young learners using visual programming languages and creative projects.

title: Junior Ninjas

teacher.name: David Rodriguez
teacher.bio: Game developer and educator who brings energy and creativity to every class. Specializes in project-based learning.

description: Extended Junior Ninjas session with more time for creative projects and hands-on learning.
